
+ `kubectl --help`


<!-- restart a deployment -->
+ `kubectl rollout restart deployment/abc`


## resources


## apply on command

```yaml

cat <<EOF | kubectl apply -f -
apiVersion: certificates.k8s.io/v1
kind: CertificateSigningRequest
metadata:
  name: developer
spec:
  request: 
  signerName: kubernetes.io/kube-apiserver-client
  usages:
  - client auth
EOF
```
